content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-1\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Creating Interview Report\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Profile and Event records are mandatory for each Applicant. Once the Applicant profile is available in the ATS, the Recruiter should go to the Applicant's profile and make a record about General Interview.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The Recruiter's feedback and comments to the interview, technical interview results, and managers' feedback of the interview should all be recorded in the ATS in the form of appropriate records such as General Interview, Technical Interview, Manager Interview.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Recruiter's feedback and comments should contain the Interview is completed, Technical Interviewer (in exceptional cases Recruiter) enters the results in the ATS as Interview hours.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"While creating feedbacks you will be able to use templates that we have on
